# DIY Piet Mondrian Artwork

Want to create artworks like Piet Mondrian in the blink of eyes? Here we packed in the structure and rhythm of the grandmaster in two distinct styles based on his time in Paris and New York, all generable with random numbers of your choice.

## Installation of the the development version


```R
devtools::install_github("yanhann10/mondrianify")
```

## Usage

```{r df}
library("mondrianify")
#make a random dataframe including two columns x and y
df=data.frame(x=sample(10,3),y=sample(10,3))
mondrian_paris(df)
mondrian_nyc(df)
```
